channel.title: Somes Problems
channel.description: 1. My Ice Barrage doesn't freeze 2. Fire cape auto keeps, but still drops.

item.title: Somes Problems
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:371471”]1. in magicHandler.java search “// freeze” until you see

|| (spellID == 1582) || (spellID == 1592) || (spellID == 12861) || (spellID == 12881) || (spellID == 12871) || (spellID == 12891)) { // Fixed // bakatool // added // all // freeze // spells. itFreezes = true;

Add your spellid with them, now, search up “// freeze” again and do the same thing

  1. Too make it undroppable search up “public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) {” in client.java somewhere under it add

if (droppedItem == 6082) { sM("You Cant drop this"); return ; }[/quote]

  1. I don’t know the Spell ID
  2. I mean drops on death.

Read full topic

item.title: Somes Problems
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

  1. in magicHandler.java search “// freeze” until you see

|| (spellID == 1582) || (spellID == 1592) || (spellID == 12861) || (spellID == 12881) || (spellID == 12871) || (spellID == 12891)) { // Fixed // bakatool // added // all // freeze // spells. itFreezes = true;

Add your spellid with them, now, search up “// freeze” again and do the same thing

  1. Too make it undroppable search up “public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) {” in client.java somewhere under it add

if (droppedItem == 6082) { sM("You Cant drop this"); return ; }

Read full topic
